  hypersummaryui

  scriptui

  snappeaalgebra
  snappeacomponents
  snappeacreator
  snappeafile
  snappeagluings
  snappeashapes
  snappeaui
  surfacescompatui
  surfacescoordinateui
  surfacescreator
  surfacesmatchingui
  surfacessummaryui
  surfacesui
  textui
  tri2creator
  tri2gluings
  tri2skeleton
  tri2ui
  tri3algebra
  tri3creator

  tri3gluings

  tri3snappea
  tri3surfaces
  tri3ui
  tri4algebra
  tri4creator
  tri4gluings
  tri4skeleton
  tri4ui
  )

FOREACH( FILE ${FILES} )
  SET( SOURCES ${SOURCES} packets/${FILE})
ENDFOREACH(FILE)
SET( SOURCES ${SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
